snippet: Many players think that squeezes are executed only by experts. But some just “play themselves.”
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played at the senior trial for the World Mind Sports Games.
lead_paragraph: Many players think that squeezes are executed only by experts. But some just “play themselves.”
